song.title: 1-800-NATALIE
song.info:
”1-800-NATALIE” is a romantic synth track made on the Atari Falcon Home Computer with Ace Tracker 2 (newbeat.atari.org).
----- Composing (tracking), vocals/lyrics, mixing: Timbral Mastering: Christian Mars (analogsweetening.com) Artwork (pixels): Timbral (based on some picture I found but lost the source of) "Hello"-sample: by @utilitycloset
And a special thanks to @jjmist for encouraging words and feedback on my vocals.
-----
"Hello?"
Natalie, you must be tired now Because you're always running through my mind Oh yes, I know, it is just for show When you say that we were ??? somehow
I found your advert in a magazine The picture got me hooked; your eyes were so pristine I thought to myself, then I dialled your number
Natalie, you must be tired now Because you're always running through my mind I start to realise, suppose it's no surprise That hooking up with me is not part of your style
I found your advert in a magazine The picture got me hooked; your eyes were so pristine I thought to myself, gotta stop calling your number, baby
Gotta stop calling your number, baby, tonight Gotta stop calling your number, baby, every night...
